postsTabDescription: Create, manage and publish blog posts
newPostTabDescription: Create a new blog with AI
titleInputHint: Enter a title for your blog post. Example: How to create a blog post with AI
instructionsInputHint: Additional instructions to help the AI generate better content. Example: This blog post will show you how to create a blog post with AI
subHeadingPlaceholder: Add a subheading here. This corresponds to an h3 tag in your blog post.
generatingPost: Creating post. This may take a few minutes...
addHeadingButtonLabel: Add your heading here. This corresponds to an h2 tag in your blog post
outlineIntroductionPlaceholder: We will add an introduction here
outlineConclusionPlaceholder: We will add a conclusion here
postCreationFailed: Post creation failed. Please try again later.
